channel.title: Staff zone
channel.description:
ok i got my server running i play it with some of my friends but... i dun have a staff zone so what i asking = how to add a staff zone :confused: maby someone has a code or something for a nice staff zone or can i steal it from another source... i dont now much of coding so plz give me a tutorial or something
greetz dvdnext thank you :)

item.title: Staff zone
item.dc:creator: @dvdnext dvdnext
item.description:
@dvdnext wrote:

God11:

dude sorry to say obiviously you dont know what your doing then if it dont work. They gave you prettyl simple command that works. Search for you home command and place it under that and change the coords to a place YOU want we arent going to give u a staffzone place. easy as that and after putting command in. save compile and boom. oh make sure your acc your trying to use the command on has rights 1+ that could be why it dont work.

lol i know how it works i search command.start thingy then post the code beneath it change the coords…
then i compile then boom nothing happens i m owner its is right 3 so i think it should work so…
maby my compiler is wrong?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2009, 11:54:29 pm[/size][hr]lol u ppl
its just toX and toY u didnt tell me that so i found out myself XD

Read full topic

item.title: Staff zone
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“GH_Addict, post:18, topic:293536”]if(command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights > 0){ triggerTele(2895, 9696, -4); //XXXX, YYYY, #(hight - usually 0) sM("[server] Welcome to the new staff zone"); }

if your using a source like pwnscape[/quote]You mean deltascape

@CoonHunter - I posted the exact same thing you just did before you. And he said he didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff zone
item.dc:creator: @GH_Addict GH_Addict
item.description:
@GH_Addict wrote:

if(command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights > 0){ triggerTele(2895, 9696, -4); //XXXX, YYYY, #(hight - usually 0) sM("[server] Welcome to the new staff zone"); }

if your using a source like Deltascape Fixed thanks for the correction: Mitko

item.title: Staff zone
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

@Mitko - i didnt see you posted that one with the CORRECT part for it. All i saw was one from you for owner+ and one from someone for Mod only.

@dvdnext - Here ill make a short explination of it. Even though i hate doing this.

if (command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1){//this line says when someone uses ::staffzone they MUST have playerRights 1 or above for this command to work.

teleportToX = ####; // this line is the X cordinate of where you want you to be teleported

teleportToY = ####;//this line is the Y cordinate of where you want to be teleported

sendMessage("message");//replace message inside the "'s to what you want it to say when this command is used

}//ends the command

Read full topic

item.title: Staff zone
item.dc:creator: @dvdnext dvdnext
item.description:
@dvdnext wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:2, topic:293536”]Pick a place and spawn w/e you want in it (You can find a tut about spawning objects if you don’t know how).
If you want to go there by command, you can make it like this:

if (command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights == 1){ teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("message"); }
Done.[/quote]
where do i have to put it
client.java or else?

Read full topic

item.title: Staff zone
item.dc:creator: @Reisyukaku Reisyukaku
item.description:
@Reisyukaku wrote:

well all you really have to do is find a nice building or something, blocade it in so no one can get in, then put a teleport some where that to the inside of the building… and to make it so that only admins or owners can get in you would need to start the code off kinda like this:

if(playerRights >=2) {
insert code here
}

Read full topic

item.title: Staff zone
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Pick a place and spawn w/e you want in it (You can find a tut about spawning objects if you don’t know how).
If you want to go there by command, you can make it like this:

if (command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights == 1){ teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("message"); }
Done.

Read full topic
